definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I and a yellow army of one guitar , sings well, the sound has been broken.
sentences.chinese: 我和黄大军一人一把吉他，唱得不好，一直破音。

sentences.english: And king Demetrius heard of it, and gathered together an exceeding great army, and went forth against him to fight.
sentences.chinese: 德默特琉王听说这事，就集合大军，去与他交战。

sentences.english: So the Jin troops used the path that they borrowed to attack Guo and they scored a decisive victory.
sentences.chinese: 晋大军通过虞国道路，攻打虢国，很快就取得了胜利。

sentences.english: It spurns delay and pointless diplomacy. An army of sperm must assault an ova and overcome it.
sentences.chinese: 精子大军必须侵入一个卵子并且占有它。

sentences.english: Without any training, I joined millions of other soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 没有经过任何训练，我便加入了百万大军。

sentences.english: Apple will compete with an army of Androids for the consumer market.
sentences.chinese: 苹果将和机器人大军在消费市场展开大战。

sentences.english: How prophet Elisa face the army of Syria by trusting God?
sentences.chinese: 神人以利沙如何靠著神面对亚兰大军？

sentences.english: A number of women are now leaving the work force to become full-time homemakers.
sentences.chinese: 许多妈妈正离开劳动大军，回家做个全职母亲。

sentences.english: After the split Taobao, Taobao Mall has been likened to Ma, "Liu and Deng."
sentences.chinese: 淘宝分拆之后，淘宝商城被马云比喻为“刘邓大军”。

sentences.english: Where are the armies of government workers?
sentences.chinese: 为政府工作的劳动大军在哪里？

sentences.english: The headquarters ordered that all the armies carry out a general attack together.
sentences.chinese: 司令部发出命令，各路大军一起开始总攻。

sentences.english: Pan Shi " it is one of main forces of Zhejiang network business."
sentences.chinese: “盘石”是浙江网商大军中的一员。

sentences.english: In the meantime, these workers were trapped in "immigration limbo."
sentences.chinese: 这些人夹杂在移民大军中，没有着落。

sentences.english: Organized labor is down to about 7 percent of the private work force.
sentences.chinese: 隶属工会组织的工人已经降到劳动力大军的7%。

sentences.english: People with bachelor's degrees and higher qualifications make up 30% of the US labor force.
sentences.chinese: 美国劳动大军中，拥有大学及以上学历者占30%。

sentences.english: The army ants are on the move.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁大军浩浩荡荡的出发了。

definition: to suppress by armed force/to send a punitive expedition against/to crusade against
to go on a punitive expedition
to dispatch an army/to send troops
